name: grant_role_request
short_doc: Grant membership in a role to a user or role
doc: Grants membership in a role to a user or role.

fields.name: role
fields.doc: Name of the role in which membership will be granted. Must be an existing role.

fields.name: member
fields.doc: Name of the user or role that will be granted membership in @{input role}. Must be an existing user or role.
